statements: SELECT * FROM communication_system;
SELECT id, message, sender, receiver FROM communication_system;
SELECT id, sender, receiver, send_date FROM communication_system WHERE read_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM communication_system WHERE sender = 'Alice';
SELECT id, receiver, send_date FROM communication_system WHERE sender = 'Bob';
SELECT id, sender, receiver, send_date FROM communication_system WHERE read_status = TRUE;
SELECT sender, receiver FROM communication_system WHERE send_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sender, receiver, send_date FROM communication_system WHERE message LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT * FROM communication_system WHERE sender = 'Charlie' AND receiver = 'Alice';
SELECT sender, receiver, send_date FROM communication_system WHERE sender = 'David' OR receiver = 'Eve';
SELECT id, send_date FROM communication_system WHERE send_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, sender, receiver FROM communication_system WHERE send_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT sender, receiver, send_date FROM communication_system WHERE sender = 'Alice' AND read_status = FALSE;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM communication_system;
SELECT DISTINCT sender FROM communication_system;
SELECT sender, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM communication_system GROUP BY sender;
SELECT receiver, AVG(id) AS avg_message_id FROM communication_system GROUP BY receiver;
SELECT MAX(send_date) AS latest_send_date FROM communication_system;
SELECT MIN(send_date) AS earliest_send_date FROM communication_system;
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_message_id FROM communication_system;
SELECT id, sender, receiver FROM communication_system ORDER BY send_date ASC;
SELECT id, message, sender, receiver, send_date, read_status FROM communication_system WHERE sender = 'Alice';
SELECT id, message, sender, receiver, send_date, read_status FROM communication_system WHERE receiver = 'Bob' AND read_status = FALSE;
SELECT id, message, sender, receiver, send_date FROM communication_system WHERE read_status = TRUE ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT id, sender, receiver, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM communication_system GROUP BY sender, receiver HAVING total_messages > 10;
SELECT sender, COUNT(*) AS sent_messages FROM communication_system GROUP BY sender ORDER BY sent_messages DESC;
SELECT receiver, COUNT(*) AS received_messages FROM communication_system GROUP BY receiver ORDER BY received_messages DESC;
SELECT sender, receiver, AVG(EXTRACT(epoch FROM send_date)) AS avg_response_time FROM communication_system GROUP BY sender, receiver;
SELECT sender, MAX(EXTRACT(epoch FROM send_date)) AS latest_sent_time FROM communication_system GROUP BY sender;
SELECT receiver, MIN(EXTRACT(epoch FROM send_date)) AS earliest_received_time FROM communication_system GROUP BY receiver;
SELECT sender, DATE_TRUNC('hour', send_date) AS hour_slot, COUNT(*) AS messages_sent_in_hour FROM communication_system GROUP BY sender, hour_slot ORDER BY sender, hour_slot;
SELECT receiver, DATE_TRUNC('day', send_date) AS day_slot, COUNT(*) AS messages_received_in_day FROM communication_system GROUP BY receiver, day_slot ORDER BY receiver, day_slot;

SELECT sender, receiver, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE read_status = TRUE) AS read_messages, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE read_status = FALSE) AS unread_messages FROM communication_system GROUP BY sender, receiver;
SELECT sender, receiver, EXTRACT(epoch FROM MAX(send_date) - MIN(send_date)) AS message_time_difference FROM communication_system GROUP BY sender, receiver;
SELECT sender, MAX(EXTRACT(epoch FROM send_date)) - MIN(EXTRACT(epoch FROM send_date)) AS total_message_time FROM communication_system GROUP BY sender;
SELECT receiver, AVG(EXTRACT(epoch FROM send_date) - EXTRACT(epoch FROM send_date)) AS avg_message_response_time FROM communication_system GROUP BY receiver;
SELECT sender, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE read_status = FALSE) AS unread_messages FROM communication_system GROUP BY sender HAVING unread_messages > 0;
SELECT receiver, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE read_status = FALSE) AS unread_messages FROM communication_system GROUP BY receiver HAVING unread_messages > 0;

SELECT sender, receiver, COUNT(*) AS message_count, MAX(EXTRACT(epoch FROM send_date)) - MIN(EXTRACT(epoch FROM send_date)) AS total_time_span FROM communication_system GROUP BY sender, receiver, total_time_span ORDER BY total_time_span DESC, message_count DESC;

SELECT sender, receiver, COUNT(*) AS message_count, AVG(EXTRACT(epoch FROM send_date) - EXTRACT(epoch FROM send_date)) AS avg_response_time FROM communication_system GROUP BY sender, receiver ORDER BY avg_response_time ASC;

SELECT sender AS user, receiver AS contact, send_date AS action_date, 'sent' AS action FROM communication_system UNION ALL SELECT receiver, sender, send_date, 'received' FROM communication_system ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE class_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 10;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM Students WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Students;
SELECT MIN(student_id) FROM Students;
SELECT MAX(student_id) FROM Students;
SELECT AVG(class_id) FROM Students;
SELECT DISTINCT class_id FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id;
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id WHERE class_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Students LEFT JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id;
SELECT * FROM Students RIGHT JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id;
SELECT * FROM Students INNER JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id;
SELECT * FROM Students FULL OUTER JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM Students WHERE parent_id = 5;
SELECT student_name, message_text FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id;
SELECT student_name, message_text FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id WHERE Students.class_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, parent_id, message_text FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id WHERE Students.class_id = 3;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM Messages WHERE message_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, student_name, parent_id FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT student_name, message_text FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id WHERE Students.parent_id = 7;
SELECT student_id, student_name, class_id FROM Students WHERE class_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT student_name, message_text FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id WHERE Students.class_id = 1 OR Students.class_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, message_text FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id WHERE Students.student_name = 'John' AND Students.class_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, message_text FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id WHERE Students.student_name LIKE 'M%' AND Students.parent_id = 5;
SELECT student_id, student_name, class_id, parent_id FROM Students WHERE student_id < 100;
SELECT student_name, message_text FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id WHERE Students.class_id = 3 ORDER BY message_time DESC;
SELECT student_id, parent_id FROM Students WHERE class_id = 1 AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = student_id);
SELECT student_name, message_text FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id WHERE Students.parent_id = 7 GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT student_name, message_text FROM Students LEFT JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.sender_id;
SELECT student_name, message_text FROM Students RIGHT JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.receiver_id;
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS total_students, class_id FROM Students GROUP BY class_id;
SELECT AVG(student_id) AS avg_student_id, class_id FROM Students GROUP BY class_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_name FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Parents WHERE parent_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, parent_id FROM Students WHERE class_id = 101;
SELECT student_name, teacher_id FROM Students JOIN Teachers ON Students.class_id = Teachers.teacher_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT teacher_name FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE class_id IN (101, 102);
SELECT parent_name FROM Parents WHERE parent_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT MAX(student_id) AS max_student_id FROM Students;
SELECT MIN(student_id) AS min_student_id FROM Students;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM Students;
SELECT AVG(class_id) AS avg_class_id FROM Students;
SELECT SUM(student_id) AS total_student_ids FROM Students;
SELECT DISTINCT class_id FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM Students WHERE student_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_name IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT class_id, teacher_id FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, parent_name FROM Students JOIN Parents ON Students.parent_id = Parents.parent_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM Students WHERE parent_id = 2;
SELECT teacher_name FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, teacher_name FROM Students JOIN Teachers ON Students.class_id = Teachers.teacher_id;
SELECT student_name, parent_name FROM Students JOIN Parents ON Students.parent_id = Parents.parent_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Students;
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE class_id IN (SELECT teacher_id FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_name = 'John');
SELECT student_id, parent_name FROM Students JOIN Parents ON Students.parent_id = Parents.parent_id WHERE student_id = 4;
SELECT MAX(student_id) FROM Students;
SELECT SUM(class_id) FROM Students;
SELECT DISTINCT parent_id FROM Students;
SELECT AVG(class_id) FROM Students;
SELECT student_id FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT MIN(student_id) FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Students LIMIT 5;
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_name FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT class_id) FROM Students;
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE class_id NOT IN (SELECT teacher_id FROM Teachers);
SELECT parent_id FROM Parents WHERE parent_name IN (SELECT parent_name FROM Students WHERE class_id = 1);
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_name FROM Teachers ORDER BY teacher_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(class_id) AS avg_class_size, MAX(class_id) AS max_class_size FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Students;

SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10;

SELECT teacher_name, department FROM Teachers ORDER BY teacher_name ASC;
SELECT parent_name, email FROM Parents ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, sent_timestamp FROM Messages ORDER BY sent_timestamp ASC;

SELECT teacher_name, message_text, sent_timestamp FROM Teachers t JOIN Messages m ON t.teacher_id = m.receiver_id;
SELECT student_name, parent_name, message_text, sent_timestamp FROM Students s JOIN Parents p ON s.parent_id = p.parent_id JOIN Messages m ON s.student_id = m.receiver_id;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Students;
SELECT AVG(grade_level) FROM Students;
SELECT MAX(grade_level) FROM Students;
SELECT teacher_name, COUNT(notification_id) AS total_notifications FROM Teachers LEFT JOIN Notifications ON Teachers.teacher_id = Notifications.target_id GROUP BY teacher_name;
SELECT parent_name, message_text FROM Parents LEFT JOIN Messages ON Parents.parent_id = Messages.receiver_id;
SELECT teacher_name, notification_text FROM Teachers JOIN Notifications ON Teachers.teacher_id = Notifications.target_id WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT parent_name, email FROM Parents ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(grade_level) AS average_grade_level, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM Students;
SELECT teacher_name, AVG(grade_level) AS avg_grade_level FROM Teachers JOIN Students ON Teachers.teacher_id = Students.grade_level GROUP BY teacher_name HAVING AVG(grade_level) > 10;
